text: A group of students along with their parents resorted to a road roko on Thuraiyur - Namakkal Road at Sakkampatti on Thursday irked over government buses not halting at the designated bus stop and stopping some distance away and point-to-point services not halting at the stop. Sources said the road roko went on for nearly 30 minutes during the morning hours prompting the intervention of the police. The students were irked over the reported rude behaviour of some bus conductors with them during travel. Police personnel came to the spot and held talks with the protesting students and parents who gave up their stir after sometime.
title: Students block road
